mapper.select: SELECT id, cartlist_id AS cartListId, item_id AS itemId, quantity, is_hold AS isHold, updated_at AS updatedAt FROM cart WHERE cartlist_id = #{cartListId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart (cartlist_id, item_id, quantity, is_hold, updated_at) VALUES (#{cartListId}, #{itemId}, #{quantity}, #{isHold}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.update: UPDATE cart SET quantity = #{quantity}, is_hold = #{isHold}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE cart SET quantity = quantity + #{count}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{cart.id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM cart WHERE cartlist_id IN ( SELECT id FROM cart_list WHERE is_login_user = FALSE )
